message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm asking for $22,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not willing to pay $22,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000? This reflects the quality and potential this product offers.
I understand your perspective, but $18,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
